00021 import os
00022 os.chdir("/usr/share/winsol/")
00023 import sys
00024 import shutil
00025 import winsollib
00026 
00027 #
00028 # WinSOL Configuration
00029 #
00030 #   see ./baseconfig/config
00031 #       ~/.winsol/config
00032 #
00033 
00034 ## WinSOL master directory path.
00035 MASTER_DIR = "/usr/share/winsol"
00036 ## User config directory path.
00037 CONFIG_DIR = os.getenv("HOME")+"/.winsol"
00038 
00039 # DTD's
00040 
00041 ## System categories DTD file path.
00042 CATEGORIES_DTD = MASTER_DIR + "/categories.dtd"
00043 ## System applications DTD file path.
00044 APPS_DTD = MASTER_DIR + "/apps.dtd"
00045 ## System includes DTD file path.
00046 INCLUDES_DTD = MASTER_DIR + "/includes.dtd"
00047 
00048 # System's XML files
00049 
00050 ## System categories XML file path.
00051 MASTER_CATEGORIES_XML = MASTER_DIR + "/categories.xml"
00052 ## System applications XML file path.
00053 MASTER_APPS_XML = MASTER_DIR + "/apps.xml"
00054 
00055 # User's XML files
00056 
00057 ## User categories XML file path.
00058 USER_CATEGORIES_XML = CONFIG_DIR + "/categories.xml"
00059 ## User applications XML file path.
00060 USER_APPS_XML = CONFIG_DIR + "/apps.xml"
00061 ## User includes XML file path.
00062 USER_INCLUDES_XML = CONFIG_DIR + "/includes.xml"
00063 
00064 # User's config variables
00065 
00066 ## User source image directory path.
00067 IMAGE_DIR = CONFIG_DIR + "/image"
00068 ## User software directory path.
00069 SOFTWARE_DIR = CONFIG_DIR + "/software"
00070 ## User icon directory path.
00071 ICONS_DIR = CONFIG_DIR + "/icons"
00072 ## User manuals directory path.
00073 MANUALS_DIR = CONFIG_DIR + "/manuals"
00074 ## User template html directory path.
00075 TEMPLATE_DIR = MASTER_DIR+"/baseconfig/templates/default" 
00076 ## User ISO file path.
00077 ISO_FILE = CONFIG_DIR + "/WinSOL.iso"
00078 ## User html directory path. 
00079 HTML_DIR = IMAGE_DIR + "/html"
00080 
00081 
00082 if not os.path.exists(CONFIG_DIR):
00083         os.mkdir(CONFIG_DIR)
00084         shutil.copy(MASTER_DIR+"/baseconfig/config",CONFIG_DIR+"/config")
00085         shutil.copy(MASTER_DIR+"/baseconfig/categories.xml",CONFIG_DIR+"/categories.xml")
00086         shutil.copy(MASTER_DIR+"/baseconfig/apps.xml",CONFIG_DIR+"/apps.xml")
00087         shutil.copy(MASTER_DIR+"/baseconfig/includes.xml",CONFIG_DIR+"/includes.xml")
00088         execfile(CONFIG_DIR+"/config")
00089 else:
00090         if os.path.exists(CONFIG_DIR+"/config"): 
00091                 execfile(CONFIG_DIR+"/config")
00092         else:
00093                 shutil.copy(MASTER_DIR+"/baseconfig/config",CONFIG_DIR+"/config")
00094                 execfile(CONFIG_DIR+"/config")
00095 
00096 if not os.path.exists(CONFIG_DIR+"/categories.xml"):
00097         shutil.copy(MASTER_DIR+"/baseconfig/categories.xml",CONFIG_DIR+"/categories.xml")
00098 
00099 if not os.path.exists(CONFIG_DIR+"/apps.xml"):
00100         shutil.copy(MASTER_DIR+"/baseconfig/apps.xml",CONFIG_DIR+"/apps.xml")
00101 
00102 if not os.path.exists(CONFIG_DIR+"/includes.xml"):
00103         shutil.copy(MASTER_DIR+"/baseconfig/includes.xml",CONFIG_DIR+"/includes.xml")

00105 ## WinSOL Command Interface class.
00106 #
00107 # @author David Barrag√°n Merino <bameda [AT] di.uc3m [DOT] com>
00108 # @author CRISOL-UC3M <htp://crisol.uc3m.es>
00109 class WinSOL:
00110         
00111         ## Inicialiced tthe new image object.
00112         #
00113         # @param xml_files  (\c list[5]) The XML files path (sys_categories, sys_apps, user_categories, user_apps, user_includes).
00114         # @param dtd_files  (\c list[3]) The DTD files path (categories, apps, includes)
00115         def __init__(self, xml_files, dtd_files):
00116                 self.__xml_files = []
00117                 self.__xml_files = xml_files
00118                 self.__dtd_files = []
00119                 self.__dtd_files = dtd_files
00120                 self.__image = winsollib.Image(self.__xml_files, self.__dtd_files)
00121 
00122         ## Generate the image html files.
00123         #
00124         # @param image_dir - The image directory path.
00125         # @param template_dir  The templates directory path.
00126         def html(self,image_dir,template_dir):
00127                 if not os.path.exists( image_dir ): 
00128                         os.mkdir( image_dir )
00129                 if not os.path.exists( image_dir + "/html" ): 
00130                         os.mkdir( image_dir + "/html" )
00131                 else:
00132                         os.system( "rm -rf '" + image_dir + "/html"  + "'" )
00133                         os.mkdir( image_dir+"/html" )
00134 
00135                 self.__image.gen_html(image_dir+"/html", template_dir )
00136 
00137         ## List all categories and applications.
00138         #
00139         def list(self):
00140                 for category in self.__image.get_all_categories():
00141                         if category.is_included(): 
00142                                 print "\t+ " + category.get_name() +" (" + category.get_label() + ")" 
00143                         elif not category.is_included(): 
00144                                 print "\t- " + category.get_name() +" (" + category.get_label() + ")"
00145                         for app in self.__image.get_apps_by_category( category.get_label() ):
00146                                 if app.is_included(): 
00147                                         print "\t  + " + app.get_name()
00148                                 elif not app.is_included():
00149                                         print "\t  - " + app.get_name()
00150 
00151         ## List all applications with its versions.
00152         #
00153         # This method is only for development. 
00154         def list_apps(self):
00155                 for app in self.__image.get_all_apps():
00156                         print "\t\t" + app.get_name() + " " + app.get_version()
00157 
00158         ## Add a new Category.
00159         #
00160         def add_category(self):
00161                 print "Write the \"Category Name\":",
00162                 name = raw_input()
00163                 print "Write the \"Category Label\":",
00164                 label = raw_input()
00165                 print "Write the \"Category Description\":",
00166                 description = raw_input()
00167 
00168                 if ( self.__image.add_category( [name, label, description] )):
00169                         print "!! Adding \"" + name + "\" category." 
00170                         self.__image.save_categories_to_xml_file()
00171                 else:
00172                         print "EE Unable to add the new category, it's possible that there is another one with the same label."
00173 
00174         ## Delete the Category with the same label as \em label param.
00175         #
00176         # @param label - Label of any Category.
00177         def del_category(self, label = ""):
00178                 if self.__image.del_category(label):
00179                         print "!! Deleting category \"" + label + "\""
00180                         self.__image.save_categories_to_xml_file()
00181                         self.__image.save_includes_to_xml_file()
00182                 else:
00183                         print "EE Unable to delete the category. It's possible that there isn't any category with this label or this category is protected"     
00184 
00185         ## Modify the Category with the same label as \em label param.
00186         #
00187         # @param label - Label of any category.
00188         def modify_category(self, label):
00189                 if self.__image.get_category_by_label(label) == None:
00190                         print "EE There isn't any category with that label"
00191                 else:
00192                         dict = self.__image.get_category_dict_by_label(label)
00193                         values = []
00194                         
00195                         print "Write the \"Category Name\" (default: \"" + dict['name'] + "\"):",
00196                         name = raw_input()
00197                         if name == "": name = dict['name']
00198                         values.append(name)
00199                         
00200                         print "Write the \"Category Description\" (default: \"" + dict['description'] + "\"):",
00201                         description = raw_input()
00202                         if description == "": description = dict['description']
00203                         values.append(description)
00204 
00205                         if self.__image.modify_category_values(label, values):
00206                                 print "!! Modify \"" + name + "\" category." 
00207                                 self.__image.save_categories_to_xml_file()
00208                                 self.__image.save_applications_to_xml_file()
00209                         else:
00210                                 # Imposible
00211                                 print "EE There is already a category with that label."
00212 
00213         ## Select the Category with the same label as \em label param.
00214         #
00215         # @param label - Label of any Category.
00216         def select_category(self, label):
00217                 if self.__image.select_category(label):
00218                         print "!! The category is selected"
00219                         self.__image.save_includes_to_xml_file()
00220                 else:
00221                         print "EE There isn't any category with that label"
00222 
00223         ## Select all categories.
00224         #
00225         def select_all_categories(self):
00226                 if self.__image.select_all_categories():        
00227                         print "!! All categories are selected"
00228                         self.__image.save_includes_to_xml_file()
00229                 else:
00230                         print "EE Unable to selected all categories"
00231 
00232         ## Unselect the Category with the same label as \em label param.
00233         #
00234         # @param label - Label of any Category.
00235         def unselect_category(self, label):
00236                 if self.__image.unselect_category(label):
00237                         print "!! The category is unselected"
00238                         self.__image.save_includes_to_xml_file()
00239                 else:
00240                         print "EE There isn't any category with that label"
00241 
00242         ## Unselect all categories.
00243         #
00244         def unselect_all_categories(self):
00245                 if self.__image.unselect_all_categories():      
00246                         print "!! All categories are unselected"
00247                         self.__image.save_includes_to_xml_file()
00248                 else:
00249                         print "EE Unable to unselected all categories"
00250 
00251         ## View the information from a Category with the same label as \em label param.
00252         #
00253         # @param label - Label of any Category.
00254         def view_category(self, label):
00255                 if self.__image.get_category_by_label(label) == None:
00256                         print "EE There isn't any category with that label"
00257                 else:
00258                         dict = self.__image.get_category_dict_by_label(label)
00259                         print " CATEGORY DETAILS:"
00260                         print ""
00261                         print "   NAME:\t\t" + dict['name']
00262                         print "   LABEL:\t\t" + dict['label']
00263                         print "   DESCRIPTION:\t\t" + dict['description']
00264                         if dict["included"]: print "   INCLUDED:\t\tyes"
00265                         else: print "   INCLUDED:\t\tno"
00266                         if len( dict['apps'] ) > 0:
00267                                 print "   APLICATIONS:"
00268                                 for app in dict['apps']:
00269                                         print "         \t\t- " + app['name']
00270                         print""

00340                         if category != None:
00341                                 categories.append(category)

00553         
00554         ## Select all aplications.
00555         #
00556         def select_all_applications(self):
00557                 if self.__image.select_all_apps():
00558                         print "!! All the applications are selected"
00559                         self.__image.save_includes_to_xml_file()
00560                 else:
00561                         print "EE Unable to select all applications"
00562         
00563         ## Select all aplications include in a Category with the same label as \em category_label param.
00564         #
00565         # @param category_label - Label of any Category.
00566         def select_all_applications_by_category(self, category_label):
00567                 if self.__image.select_apps_by_category(category_label):
00568                         print "!! All applications from \"" + category_label + "\" category are selected"
00569                         self.__image.save_includes_to_xml_file()
00570                 else:
00571                         print "EE There isn't any category with that name"
00572 
00573         ## Unselect the App with the same name as \em name param.
00574         #
00575         # @param name - Name of any App.
00576         def unselect_application(self, name):
00577                 if self.__image.unselect_app(name):
00578                         print "!! The application is unselected"
00579                         self.__image.save_includes_to_xml_file()
00580                 else:
00581                         print "EE There isn't any application with that name"

00588                         self.__image.save_includes_to_xml_file()
00589                 else:

00602         ## View the information from an App with the same name as \em name param.
00603         #
00604         # @param name - Name of any App.
00605         def view_application(self, name):
00606                 if self.__image.get_app_by_name(name) == None:
00607                         print "EE There isn't any application with that name"
00608                 else:
00609                         dict = self.__image.get_app_dict_by_name(name)
00610                         print " APPLICATION DETAILS:"
00611                         print ""
00612                         print "   NAME:\t\t" + dict['name']
00613                         print "   VERSION:\t\t" + dict['version']
00614                         
00615                         print "   SITE:\t\t" + dict['site']
00616                         if ( (len(dict['manuals']['app_man_online']) > 0) or (len(dict['manuals']['app_man_offline']) > 0) ): print "   MANUALS"
00617                         if ( len(dict['manuals']['app_man_online']) > 0 ):
00618                                 print "     ONLINE MANUALS:"
00619                                 for man in dict['manuals']['app_man_online']:
00620                                         print "     \t=> NAME:\t\t" + man['app_man_on_name']
00621                                         print "     \t   URL:\t\t\t" + man['app_man_on_url']
00622                                         print "     \t   LANGUAGE:\t\t" + man['app_man_on_lang']
00623                                         print "     \t   DESCRIPTION:\t\t" + man['app_man_on_description']
00624                                         
00625                         if ( len(dict['manuals']['app_man_offline']) > 0 ):
00626                                 print "     OFFLINE MANUALS:"
00627                                 for man in dict['manuals']['app_man_offline']:
00628                                         print "     \t=> NAME:\t\t" + man['app_man_off_name']
00629                                         print "     \t   URL:\t\t\t" + man['app_man_off_url']
00630                                         print "     \t   FILE NAME:\t\t" + man['app_man_off_file']
00631                                         print "     \t   LANGUAGE:\t\t" + man['app_man_off_lang']
00632                                         print "     \t   DESCRIPTION:\t\t" + man['app_man_off_description']
00633                         if len( dict['plataforms'] ) > 0:
00634                                 print "   PLATFORMS:"
00635                                 for plat in dict['plataforms']:
00636                                         print "         \t\t" + plat
00637                         print "   FILE:\t\t" + dict['file']
00638                         print "   SOFTWARE URL:\t" + dict['software_url']
00639                         print "   ICON:\t\t" + dict['icon']
00640                         if dict['icon_url'] != None:print "   ICON URL:\t\t" + dict['icon_url']
00641                         print "   MD5SUM:\t\t" + dict['md5sum']
00642                         if dict['included']: print "   INCLUDED:\t\tyes"
00643                         else: print "   INCLUDED:\t\tno"
00644                         if len( dict['categories'] ) > 0:
00645                                 print "   CATEGORIES:"
00646                                 for cat in dict['categories']:
00647                                         print "         \t\t" + cat     
00648                         if len( dict['alternatives'] ) > 0:
00649                                 print "   ALTERNATIVES:"
00650                                 for alt in dict['alternatives']:
00651                                         if alt != None:
00652                                                 print "         \t\t" + alt
00653                         print "   MINI-DESCRIPTION:\t" + dict['minidescription']
00654                         print "   DESCRIPTION:\t\t" + dict['description']
00655                         print""

00657         ## Remove the \em imagen_dir source directory.
00658         #
00659         # @param image_dir - User image source directory path.
00660         def clean(self, image_dir):
00661                 os.system( "rm -rf '"+ image_dir +"'" )
00662 
00663         ## Remove the user 'config_dir' directory.
00664         #
00665         # @param config_dir - User configuration directory path.
00666         def mrproper(self, config_dir):
00667                 os.system( "rm -rf '"+ config_dir +"'" )
00668         
00669         ## Make an Iso image from the imagen source directory.
00670         #
00671         # @param image_dir - User image source directory path.
00672         # @param iso_file - User iso file path.
00673         def iso(self, image_dir, iso_file):
00674                 self.__image.make_iso( image_dir, iso_file )
00675 
00676         ## Download all files (software, manuals and icons) to make an iso file.
00677         #
00678         # @param software_dir - User software directory path.
00679         # @param icon_dir - User icon directory path.
00680         # @param manual_dir - User manuals directory path.
00681         def download(self, software_dir, icon_dir, manual_dir):
00682                 if not os.path.exists( software_dir ): os.mkdir( software_dir )
00683                 if not os.path.exists( icon_dir ): os.mkdir( icon_dir )
00684                 if not os.path.exists( manual_dir ): os.mkdir( manual_dir )
00685                 
00686                 self.__image.download_software( software_dir )
00687                 self.__image.download_icons( icon_dir )
00688                 self.__image.download_manuals( manual_dir)
00689 
00690                 self.__image.save_applications_to_xml_file()
00691                 self.__image.save_includes_to_xml_file()
00692 
00693         ## Create the user source image directory.
00694         #
00695         # \li Cretae the structure.
00696         # \li Create links to all selected aplications software, icons and manuals.
00697         # \li Create links to cd-base files (cd icon, autoeun,...i).
00698         #
00699         # @param image_dir - The image directory path.
00700         # @param software_dir - The software directory path.
00701         # @param icons_dir - The icons directory path.
00702         # @param manual_dir - The manuals directory path.
00703         # @param master_dir - The WinSOL master directory path.
00704         def copy( self, image_dir, software_dir, icons_dir, manual_dir, master_dir ):
00705                 """ Create the user source image directory: 
00706 
00707                 \li Cretae the structure.
00708                 \li Create links to all selected aplications software, icons and manuals.
00709                 \li Create links to cd-base files (cd icon, autoeun,...)
00710                 """
00711                 if not os.path.exists( image_dir ): os.mkdir( image_dir )
00712                 if not os.path.exists( image_dir + "/software" ): os.mkdir(image_dir + "/software" )
00713                 if not os.path.exists( image_dir + "/html" ): os.mkdir(image_dir + "/html" )
00714                 if not os.path.exists( image_dir + "/html/icons" ): os.mkdir( image_dir + "/html/icons" )
00715                 if not os.path.exists( image_dir + "/manuals" ): os.mkdir(image_dir + "/manuals" )
00716                 for category in self.__image.get_all_categories():
00717                         if category.is_included():
00718                                 for app in category.get_all_apps():
00719                                         if app.is_included():
00720                                                 if not os.path.exists( image_dir + "/software/" + app.get_file_name() ):
00721                                                         if os.path.exists( software_dir + "/" + app.get_file_name() ):
00722                                                                 os.symlink( software_dir + "/" + app.get_file_name(), image_dir + "/software/" + app.get_file_name() )
00723                                                 if not os.path.exists( image_dir + "/html/icons/" + app.get_icon_name() ):
00724                                                         if  os.path.exists( icons_dir + "/" + app.get_icon_name() ):
00725                                                                 os.symlink( icons_dir + "/" + app.get_icon_name(), image_dir + "/html/icons/" + app.get_icon_name() )
00726                                                 for manual in app.get_manuals()['app_man_offline']:
00727                                                         if not os.path.exists( image_dir + "/manuals/" + manual['app_man_off_file'] ):
00728                                                                 if os.path.exists( manual_dir + "/" + manual['app_man_off_file'] ):
00729                                                                         os.symlink( manual_dir + "/" + manual['app_man_off_file'], image_dir + "/manuals/" + manual['app_man_off_file'] )
00730 
00731                 if not os.path.exists( image_dir + "/autorun.inf" ): os.symlink( master_dir + "/cd-base/autorun.inf", image_dir + "/autorun.inf" )
00732                 if not os.path.exists( image_dir + "/browsercall.exe" ): os.symlink( master_dir + "/cd-base/browsercall.exe", image_dir + "/browsercall.exe" )
00733                 if not os.path.exists( image_dir + "/logo.ico" ):os.symlink( master_dir + "/cd-base/logo.ico", image_dir + "/logo.ico" )
00734 
00735         ## @var __dtd_files
00736         # A DTD file path List.
00737 
00738         ## @var __xml_files
00739         # A XML file path List. 
00740 
00741         ## @var __image
00742         # Image Object.
00743         # @see winsollib.Image
00744

00748 ## Function that print the WinSOL help.
00749 #
00750 def print_help():
00751         print "Usage: " + sys.argv[0] + " <option> [parameter]\n"
00752         print "Options:"
00753         print ""
00754         print "  Operations over applications:"
00755         print "    add_app\t\t\t\t\t  Add an application."
00756         print "    del_app <app-name>\t\t\t\t  Remove an application."
00757         print "    mod_app <app-name>\t\t\t\t  Modify an application."
00758         print "    select_app <app-name>\t\t\t  Select applications to include."
00759         print "    select_all_apps\t\t\t\t  Select all applications."
00760         print "    select_all_apps_by_categ <categ-label>\t  Select all applications by category."
00761         print "    unselect_app <app-name>\t\t\t  Unselect applications to include."
00762         print "    unselect_all_apps\t\t\t\t  Unselect all applications."
00763         print "    unselect_all_apps_by_categ <categ-label>\t  Unselect all applications by category."
00764         print "    view_app <app-name>\t\t\t\t  View an application details,"
00765         print ""
00766         print "  Operations over categories:"
00767         print "    add_categ\t\t\t\t\t  Add a category."
00768         print "    del_categ <categ-label>\t\t\t  Remove a category."
00769         print "    mod_categ <categ-label>\t\t\t  Modify a category,"
00770         print "    select_categ <categ-label>\t\t\t  Select categories to include."
00771         print "    select_all_categ\t\t\t\t  Select all categories,"   
00772         print "    unselect_categ <categ-label>\t\t  Unselect categories to include."
00773         print "    unselect_all_categ\t\t\t\t  Select all categories,"
00774         print "    view_categ <categ-label>\t\t\t  View a category details,"
00775         print ""
00776         print "    select_all\t\t\t\t\t  Select all applications and categories."
00777         print "    unselect_all\t\t\t\t  Unselect all applications and categories."
00778         print ""
00779         print ""
00780         print "  Image options:"        
00781         print "    all\t\t\t\t\t\t  Execute html, copy and iso actions."
00782         print "    clean\t\t\t\t\t  Clean the image directory."
00783         print "    copy\t\t\t\t\t  Copy base files, software and icons."
00784         print "    download\t\t\t\t\t  Download the necessary software."
00785         print "    html\t\t\t\t\t  Generate html files into the image."
00786         print "    iso\t\t\t\t\t\t  Generate an iso image from image directory."
00787         print "    list\t\t\t\t\t  List all applications and the status."
00788         print "    mrproper\t\t\t\t\t  Clean the user config dir."
00789         print ""
00790         print "  EXAMPLE:"
00791         print "    To make a Iso image with all categories and applications do:"
00792         print "         winsol select_all"
00793         print "         winsol download"
00794         print "         winsol copy"
00795         print "         winsol html"
00796         print "         winsol iso"
00797         print "    or"
00798         print "        winsol select_all"
00799         print "        winsol all" 
00800 
00801 if len( sys.argv ) < 2 or len ( sys.argv ) > 3:
00802         print_help()
00803 else:
00804         
00805         xml_files = [ MASTER_CATEGORIES_XML, MASTER_APPS_XML, USER_CATEGORIES_XML, USER_APPS_XML, USER_INCLUDES_XML ]
00806         dtd_files = [ CATEGORIES_DTD, APPS_DTD, INCLUDES_DTD]

00808 #       try:
00809         winsol = WinSOL( xml_files, dtd_files )
00810 #       except Exception, e:    
00811 #               print"EE Error. the program finish."
00812         
00813         if sys.argv[1] == "html":
00814                 winsol.html( IMAGE_DIR, TEMPLATE_DIR )
00815         elif sys.argv[1] == "clean":
00816                 winsol.clean(IMAGE_DIR)
00817         elif sys.argv[1] == "mrproper":
00818                 winsol.mrproper(CONFIG_DIR)
00819         elif sys.argv[1] == "iso":
00820                 winsol.iso(IMAGE_DIR, ISO_FILE)
00821         elif sys.argv[1] == "download":
00822                 winsol.download(SOFTWARE_DIR, ICONS_DIR, MANUALS_DIR)
00823         elif sys.argv[1] == "copy":
00824                 winsol.copy(IMAGE_DIR, SOFTWARE_DIR, ICONS_DIR, MANUALS_DIR, MASTER_DIR)
00825         elif sys.argv[1] == "all":
00826                 winsol.download(SOFTWARE_DIR, ICONS_DIR, MANUALS_DIR)
00827                 winsol.html(IMAGE_DIR, TEMPLATE_DIR)
00828                 winsol.copy(IMAGE_DIR, SOFTWARE_DIR, ICONS_DIR, MANUALS_DIR, MASTER_DIR)
00829                 winsol.iso(IMAGE_DIR, ISO_FILE)
00830         elif sys.argv[1] == "list":
00831                 winsol.list()
00832         elif sys.argv[1] == "list_apps":
00833                 winsol.list_apps()
00834         # Categories functions
00835         elif sys.argv[1] == "add_categ":
00836                 winsol.add_category()
00837         elif sys.argv[1] == "del_categ":
00838                 winsol.del_category(sys.argv[2])
00839         elif sys.argv[1] == "mod_categ":
00840                 winsol.modify_category(sys.argv[2])
00841         elif sys.argv[1] == "select_categ":
00842                 winsol.select_category(sys.argv[2])
00843         elif sys.argv[1] == "select_all_categ":
00844                 winsol.select_all_categories()
00845         elif sys.argv[1] == "unselect_categ":
00846                 winsol.unselect_category(sys.argv[2])
00847         elif sys.argv[1] == "unselect_all_categ":
00848                 winsol.unselect_all_categories()
00849         elif sys.argv[1] == "view_categ":
00850                 winsol.view_category(sys.argv[2])
00851         # Applications fuction
00852         elif sys.argv[1] == "add_app":
00853                 winsol.add_application()
00854         elif sys.argv[1] == "del_app":
00855                 winsol.del_application(sys.argv[2])
00856         elif sys.argv[1] == "mod_app":
00857                 winsol.modify_application(sys.argv[2])
00858         elif sys.argv[1] == "select_app":
00859                 winsol.select_application(sys.argv[2])
00860         elif sys.argv[1] == "select_all_apps":
00861                 winsol.select_all_applications()
00862         elif sys.argv[1] == "select_all_apps_by_categ":
00863                 winsol.select_all_applications_by_category(sys.argv[2])
00864         elif sys.argv[1] == "unselect_app":
00865                 winsol.unselect_application(sys.argv[2])
00866         elif sys.argv[1] == "unselect_all_apps":
00867                 winsol.unselect_all_applications()
00868         elif sys.argv[1] == "unselect_all_apps_by_categ":
00869                 winsol.unselect_all_applications_by_category(sys.argv[2])
00870         elif sys.argv[1] == "view_app":
00871                 winsol.view_application(sys.argv[2])
00872         elif sys.argv[1] == "select_all":
00873                 winsol.select_all_categories()
00874                 winsol.select_all_applications()
00875         elif sys.argv[1] == "unselect_all":
00876                 winsol.unselect_all_categories()
00877                 winsol.unselect_all_applications()
00878         else:
00879                 print_help()
